additional_data: Horse riding will be optional during those 3 days – if interested please sign up at the registration desk and we will inform  you about the details. * All gatherings for gifferent outdoor acctivities and for departures for day trips during the tango camp  will always be in front of the Culture center, except when announced otherwise. Also, departure to each destination will be exactly on the specified times.
